name: Roy Tang
text: I defer to the wisdom of my lawyerly friends. Although "suspension of the privilege of the writ of habeas corpus" is kind of a mouthufl. As to the grounds provided by the constitution, let's hope the new chair of the committee of justice is cognizant of this

source_obj.text: I defer to the wisdom of my lawyerly friends. Although "suspension of the privilege of the writ of habeas corpus" is kind of a mouthufl. As to the grounds provided by the constitution, let's hope the new chair of the committee of justice is cognizant of this
